title: The.Hairy.Bikers.Asian.Adventure-S01-Cutdowns--BBC-2015-468p
description:
---------------------------------
Note that these are the cutdown versions of the original episodes (which were aired in 2014).
The originals ran for ~60mins, these ones here are only ~30mins
---------------------------------

The Hairy Bikers' Asian Adventure

Series 1 Cutdowns

In their most adventurous road trip yet, the Hairy Bikers tour the birthplaces of favourite Asian cuisines. 

*Episodes in this series have previously been broadcast in a different form.*

BBC (2014) 2015 - 6 Episodes
 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b0650y0b
_______________________________________

832x468 resolution

Video Codec h.264
Audio Codec AAC

With subtitles - enjoy !!
_______________________________________

    Hong Kong
    In Hong Kong the Bikers discover the secrets of wok chi at a street food stall.

    Bangkok
    The Hairy Bikers arrive in Thailand and learn how to grow and harvest rice.

    Thai Beaches
    The Hairy Bikers travel to the beaches of the south and the mountains of north Thailand.

    Japan - Tokyo
    Dave and Si discover the ultimate sushi at Tokyo's famous fish market.

    Japan - South to Kyoto
    The bikers visit the heart of traditional Japan to discover the roots of Japanese cuisine.

    South Korea
    Dave and Si discover the Korean BBQ and cook for a Korean pop star
